textAfterTable: 12 Songs Customer Reviews Didn't get 'My Way'....           by Jleebooty Could you please sort out the 'complete my album' link! Very poor service indeed. Customers who downloaded the Stellify ep early have lost out on the album release by having to pay twice. Come on Itunes           by Esteban09 Totally agree, where's the complete my album option that was promised to people who bought the EP? Great record, rubbish Itunes. Booo Hiss!           by impossiblevoices Another one who didn't get the complete my album option after buying the EP. Come on - sort it out! Biography Born: 20 February 1963 in Ancoats, Gt.
